## OIT.supportDevice() method

Checks whether the renderer supports the given device type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
supportDevice(deviceType: string): boolean;
```

The device type.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the renderer supports the device type, false otherwise.
